title: DC once a game at the beginning
body: Ever since the latest patch i have been dcing at least once a game sometimes up to 3 times in the early game and its really frustrating me because these dc's usually end up getting me killed. If anyone has any ideas on how to help fix this problem please help or bump this for someone to help me with this problem.

replies.body:
If this is happening so often that you're getting kicked out 3 times in one game, we may want to take a step back and troubleshoot this before you possibly end up getting an LPQ because of it. 

I know there's a good chance you've already tried this, but let's first make sure you run through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and update some of your port forwarding and DNS settings. Let me know how that helps!
